thread.title: Pretty soulless but a nice big bed
thread.title_full: Pretty soulless but a nice big bed - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: TonyBastin
title: Pretty soulless but a nice big bed
text:
It's a room but can't say much more than that. I've stayed in other Ibis and Accor hotels in France, which weren't too bad. They seem to be aiming at the bottom of the market in the U.K.
To be fair the room was clean, the bathroom was a plastic pod affair ( reminded me a bit of the transporter room on the starship enterprise ) but a few homely touches wouldn't go amiss. Especially as Â£140 for one night was hardly bargain basement prices.
Feel just a bit moany about this one. Accor had better up their game. Low cost doesn't have to feel like a prison cell.
